$ gocdk help provision
TODO more about provisioning

Usage:
  gocdk provision [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO provision add BIOME_NAME TYPE
  list        TODO provision list 

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for provision

Use "gocdk provision [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk provision -h
TODO more about provisioning

Usage:
  gocdk provision [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO provision add BIOME_NAME TYPE
  list        TODO provision list 

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for provision

Use "gocdk provision [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk provision --help
TODO more about provisioning

Usage:
  gocdk provision [command]

Available Commands:
  add         TODO provision add BIOME_NAME TYPE
  list        TODO provision list 

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for provision

Use "gocdk provision [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk provision
